authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
description: Australian transgender model Andreja Pejic has stunned the red carpet in an unusual outfit at the premiere of the film Personal Shopper, at the Metrograph theatre in New York on Thursday.
title: Andreja Pejc wears denim for Personal Shopper NY premiere
title_page: Andreja Pejc wears denim for Personal Shopper NY premiere | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's the Australian model who has made waves as a transgender person in the fashion industry.
And Andreja Pejic has turned heads in an unusual outfit at the premiere of the film Personal Shopper, held at the Metrograph theatre in New York on Thursday.
The 25-year-old rocked up on the red carpet in a bizarre dark double denim ensemble.
Time for your own Personal Shopper? Andreja Pejic has turned heads in an unusual outfit at the premiere of the film Personal Shopper, held at the Metrograph theatre in New York on Thursday
Her off-the-shoulder top feature several ruffles, a long zip in the centre that accentuated her cleavage and frayed detailing at the bottom.
The Bosnian-born, Melbourne raised model matched the top with the matching dark denim pencil skirt, that also featured the same frayed detailing around the knee-length hem.
To complete the ensemble, Andreja strutted around in a pair of eye catching bright red boots.
Model behaviour! She graced the event in an off-the-shoulder top with subtle ruffles, a long zip in the centre that accentuated her cleavage, with frayed detailing at the bottom, and a matching dark denim pencil skirt. And completed the outfit with eye catching bright red boots
Minimal yet dramatic: Andreja's makeup look focused on dramatic and bold eyes, with subtle baby pink lip
The Make Up For Ever ambassador's makeup look was kept minimal yet dramatic with dramatic and bold eyes, with subtle baby pink lips.
Meanwhile, her wavy blonde tresses sat neatly on her exposed shoulders.
Also at the event was the films star Kristen Stewart, star of the HBO series Girls Zosia Mamet, and socialite Olivia Palermo.
Last week, romantic speculation flared when Andreja attended Elton John's annual Elton John Oscar's viewing party as Caitlyn Jenner's date.
Strike a pose! Her wavy blonde tresses sat neatly on her exposed shoulders
Look of love! Romantic speculation flared when Andreja attended Elton John's annual Elton John party as Caitlyn Jenner's date
An onlooker told US Weekly that the former Olympian was seen 'discreetly grabbing' the younger model's hand.
'They talked to people as they walked over to the bar. Caitlyn put her hand on her back as they walked,' they added.
After Sir Elton's soiree, Andreja and Caitlyn walked the red carpet of the famed Vanity Fair Oscar Party.
Getting cosy: An onlooker at the event said the former Olympian was seen 'discreetly grabbing' the younger model's hand
The statuesque blonde even shared a snap of their appearance on Instagram with the caption, 'Hi Middle America.'
One follower commented: 'Gorgeous girls, and such an inspiration.'
While another wrote: 'I love these dresses.'
